website_summaries.verdict: Our recommended choice for solid features at a super-affordable price.
pros: Packed with great features: high-quality breathable fabric, solid protection against dust mites and pet dander
cons: Not fully waterproof, so have to be careful of spills and leaks
Sizing is not great for deep-pocket mattresses

website_summaries.verdict: Customers needing a specifically cotton terry cover will find their match in this high quality option.
pros: Protects against dust mites and other allergens
Breathable fabric keeps cool throughout the night
Simple to put on and take off
cons: Tends to shrink after being washed
Some customers complain that the cover is not completely waterproof

customer_reviews.title: For a kid? Skip this one.
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying just for allergy and sweat protection, these are probably fine. But if they're for a bed with young children, they ARE NOT even leak resistant. Tried the matched set with pillow covers, what a waste. Spend the extra money and get the set from your major bedding chain (that has the display boasting the full jar that doesn't spill through the protector - I went with 'Premium' rated and that works).
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof for bed wetter
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This mattress protector fits nicely and is soft and comfortable to sleep on. Cons: It is not waterproof. The first time my son wet the bed, the urine seeped through. The mattress has a stain now. Back to cleaning out the stain. I have changed my review from 2 stars to 1 star. The manufacturer contacted me and offered to replace my leaking protector. I agreed. The new mattress protector leaks as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year olds bed, since she still has accidents now and again. Today she had an accident during nap and I pulled off the sheets and mattress protector to discover that it seeped straight through...picture attached
customer_reviews.author: The Wang Family

customer_reviews.title: Glad I didn't count on this for an elderly person ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT waterproof. Got in bed last night and found that my mom's little Papillon had peed in my bed. Took off the sheets and this mattress pad to wash them and my new expensive mattress underneath was wet! Glad I didn't count on this for an elderly person if it couldn't take what a tiny dog puts out. Now shopping for a better mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen H.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all - Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This is product is not waterproof. My son leaked out and it soaked thru the "mattress protector" and onto the mattress. The mattress was completely soaked. How does something 100% waterproof get the mattress wet? Waste of money! Purchased through Amazon, and I am not pleased at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sagris

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for bed wetting toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these in the hopes they would protect my brand new full size mattress I purchased for my daughter. We've had them for less than two months and as I sit here at 1 AM after having to treat the mattress for the 5th time where it leaked through, I decided to write this review since I'm frustrated and I've wasted my money. Leaked through right in the middle too.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Mattress protector does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT recommend this product. I used it on the bed of an incontinent woman and it soaked straight through the mattress. It served no protection at all. Mattress ruined and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: heidi zandri

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT ALL WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for training our 5 year old to sleep overnight without a diaper on. First night, we pulled it right out of the package and put the mattress cover on. He had an accident overnight and leaked right through on the first use! Now, I am doing deep mattress cleaning! This is a nicely fitting basic mattress protector, but be warned, this cover is NOT waterproof!! My Purchase was on October 2017. I will be returning both that I purchased and am extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ryanl629

customer_reviews.title: The SureGuard Mattress Protector is amazing. It fits like a dream on our Stearns ...
customer_reviews.text: The SureGuard Mattress Protector is amazing. It fits like a dream on our Stearns & Foster Luxury Plush mattress. I was a bit worried because the mattress is quite thick, but it works beautifully. We have not had any spills since using it. The fabric is very substantial so I'm assuming that all will be fine if an accident does occur. I will update as necessary. For the moment, this is a great product and one that I would recommend to anyone with young children in the house.
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Overall fine.  But not total protection
customer_reviews.text: Keeps bed cooler, not noisy! Easy clean! Holds up on the wash. Definitely not urine proof like advertised. We had it on our bed 6 months and my son had an accident and it still leaked through... a year later, my new born leaked through her diaper a little on the sheets and it still went the protector! So if you have kids I’d say don’t buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Arrrrgh! This is not waterproof! My 3 year old had an accident (peed during the night) and the urine soaked through to her brand new mattress. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Vanster

customer_reviews.title: Not stretchy enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on a Purple mattress. I stopped using it already because it prevented me from sinking into the top later properly. It's not bad. It's not loud. It's a good cover. But it has a rubberized layer that has a limit to how far it can stretch. This caused large probs of my mattress from being comfortable. Consequently, without it my mattress is a lot better. I'm keeping it for situational use.
customer_reviews.author: Kwabina

customer_reviews.title: Urine still gets thru
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for everybed in our house because I thought they seemed like such a great quality but my daughter is old enough to potty train now & just had her first accident & urine went thru it on to the mattress! I am so disappointed that I bought so many of these since they dont work
customer_reviews.author: Aarika Shields

customer_reviews.title: Look for a more heavy duty one for older kids. This one is ideal for the young one still in diapers
customer_reviews.text: This product is strait up, grade A trash. I honestly, usually give bad products a nice way of saying they are not good quality of its purpose.....but this crib matress protector is absolutely garbage. ive had mine for 8 months and this matress protector did nothing but spread the coverage of a urine stain, AND it did not prevent that urine from reaching the actual memory foam matress.... so then my toddlers matress is thoroughly basked and marinated in urine.... I doused the matress in boiling hot water and mixed in some laundry detergents inside and let the matress sit in the rain and air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF as the label states!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for an elder parent. Mattress Protector MUST be waterproof, the package label says these are, as do many of the reviews. Regrettably, we found these to be 0% waterproof. Liquids soak right through. Did not see a "protection layer" upon opening the package, both sides are/look the same, just plain old terry cloth. So, trusted that the product would work as the label advertises, IT DIDN'T. We have returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product one year ago. I have the same product in a different mattress size that I have had for several years and been satisfied with (though rarely put to the test). Right at about a year and probably fewer than 10 washes, the cover is definitely no longer waterproof. My toddler wet the bed and a significant amount leaked through. Upon inspection, the back side seems to have thinned a bit which allowed the leak. I washed and dried per specifications, so it seems like it just hasn’t held up to washing? I’ll be replacing with a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: EiMadeULook

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased so I have a back up to use when one is soiled. Part of our mattress warranty requires it to be stain free in the event of some other kind of failure. My dog threw up on the sheet & it went through to the protector cover. I machine washed & dryer dried, it kept it's shape & went right back on like it was new. The mattress store wanted to upsell us a cover for over $200.00. Glad we held out & shopped amazon 1st. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof. Worked the first few times but now these leak every time someone has a minor accident. My husband sweats and there is a sweat stain on his side of our mattress so it doesn't even keep that out let alone if our kiddos climb on our bed and have an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Annon

customer_reviews.title: NOT leak proof or waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT leak proof. My 3 year old still wears a pull up at night. The pull up leaked through a little one night and this cover did NOT protect the mattress. It wasn’t even a lot of pee but it still seeped though and drained the mattress. Highly disappointed, as the mattress is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: JnLnO

customer_reviews.title: Just okay!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time, the material is just okay. This is actually my second one of these, I thought I was getting something else but sadly it’s the same as the one I was replacing. I didn’t look back a couple years into my account history to see if I was ordering a duplicate of something I had to throw away. It fits poorly, as did the first one. After several washes the waterproof side will began to wear and fray.
customer_reviews.author: TLHCoffey

customer_reviews.title: Encasement type mattress cover.
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this mattress encasement. My husband has allergies to dust mites and an encasement cover was recommended. It wasn’t hard to put on if two people work in conjunction with each other. Start at one end and work down! The fit isn’t as tight as I would like but it works. Quality seems to be good. I haven’t washed so I can’t contest to durability or the ease of cleaning. I will follow the directions. I’m giving it four stars from what I’ve seen and know.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Did not stop toddler pee
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mattress cover so much at first that I bought 2 more. My toddler still has nighttime accidents and it seemed to work great at first. However, I’m not sure if one or both of the others are of lesser quality or if they’ve deteriorated over time, but my son has had a couple accidents now where the mattress underneath got really damp. My picture shows the mattress cover that came with the mattress that was under the mattress pad. I just ordered a new brand of mattress protector and hope it works a lot better than this one did.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Stained, right out of the package
customer_reviews.text: Just opened this mattress protector and it has 2 stains on it. Unfortunately I did not open this in time to realize and return it as i got busy between my baby shower and child birth, so I had hoped that just washing it would take care of the problem, however it did not. I'm very disappointed in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my sons $500 mattress!!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave one star because it made me do it before it would post my review!!! Horrible product!! My sons brand new $500 mattress is ruined. He had a bed wetting accident last night I took the mattress protector off immediately and noticed his mattress was wet and smelled like urine. I'm so infuriated!!!Amazon gave me a complete refund for this so called mattress protector because I can't seem to get a actual person on the phone from Sureguard. They will be hearing from me by email about this big problem they have with their product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relieved to have this on the mattress
customer_reviews.text: The cover was washed initially before placing on the mattress and it washed and dried nicely. The cover provides a nice snug fit on the mattress. The great part is that you cannot detect there is anything under the sheet, it does not cause the body to feel hot while sleeping and there is no noise associated with the cover. To date, it has not been put the test for how it protects from spills or leaks and hopefully it never will. But that is why it is there and if that does happen, I will revisit this review and update. For now, it is comforting to know the cover is there, ready to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Amateur Tiler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product! I’ve had it less than two months and when I went to put it in the washer, I noticed the underside is flaking off! I washed it exactly as directed. So disappointed... Obviously I can’t wash it because I don’t want a million white flakes in my washer and if I did use it, it wouldn’t be waterproof. I had to go out and buy a new one locally (not the same brand). I absolutely do not recommend this product. I’m shocked at all of the positive reviews and now question if they’re legitimate.
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit 12” mattress well
customer_reviews.text: Mattress protector doesn’t fit our standard 12” deep mattress well. It is too loose, resulting in extra fabric which has the tendency of bunching up underneath the sheets. Our sheets fit our mattress very snugly, so if the mattress protector is positioned just right, the sheets will hold it in place. Everything else about the mattress protector is fine. It’s quiet and not noticeable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Pure Protection of mattresses
customer_reviews.text: These mattress covers work splendid. I bought one before for my futon - the top part was soiled, but the mattress was pristine. I then bought another one (thought it was the same brand, and it wasn't.) I just bought two more (one for my futon, and one for my mattress) - I bought these again because this mattress cover didn't survive the fire that destroyed my home. • It's easy to slip on • It's soft on the top (not vinyl like other brands) • It protects 100% • It's a little big for the mattress size
customer_reviews.author: Beth H Malbon

customer_reviews.title: It guards my mattress. How do I know? The mattress is still there!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have no clue why I bought this product. So, I dutifully unwrapped the packaging of SureGuard Mattress Protector. Immediately, the protector sprung into hyper action, creating a defensive perimeter around my new mattress. At first, I was startled by the manic activity, with sounds of radio chatter, Hollywood-esque green laser lights and night vision goggles. Later in the evening, I fell asleep in pure safety, knowing the white noise of military drones humming around the ceiling and my SureGuard kept my mattress protected from the night. Or it's just an overpriced protective fleece sheet. Po TAY Toe/ Po TAH Toe
customer_reviews.author: Working-class Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has dementia and is incontinent. Before getting this product my mattress was stained due to his accidents, even though he used Depends, and pads on top of the sheet. Now, with this product, my mattress is protected, and I no longer have to worry about my mattress getting wet. It fits the mattress perfectly and cleans easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Protector for Memory Foam Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress protector! I tried 2 others before this one and they did not fit the mattress as well and they were too stiff and interfered with the responsiveness of my new memory foam mattress. I haven’t had the need to clean it yet, but I’m sure it will be no problem. The cover is very light weight. I also haven’t spilled anything on it yet, and I don’t intend to, but I feel comfortable that it will prevent moisture from reaching my mattress. The moisture barrier can be felt by my hand, but it does not make any noise in use. I’m very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: protects our mattress from dog pee.........
customer_reviews.text: This protector replaced a $100 one sold by mattress stores and it does more than their over priced garbage ever did!! We have a dog that if we forget to close the door gets up on the bed and pee's on it... this protector WORKS!!! I just bought a second one for when we have to swap out bc the dog got on our bed nd did her thing.... IF these people made comforters we'd buy it because the pee would run off it... you can't go wrong here!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard golsteen

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one 2015 as recommended by our new mattress manufacturer. It has been great, but the elastic was getting worn after so many washes that I purchased a new one. One week after I put it on the bed, a scrape bled through a bandaid and right thru to the mattress. First time ever, a spot on the mattress. I looked closer and the quality was not as good, and it was much thinner than the first one purchased.
customer_reviews.author: SLL

customer_reviews.title: No zipper! Does not completely encase mattress. Garbage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a zipper to totally encase the mattress. I wanted one that actually totally encased my mattress. This is just a fancy fitted sheet. If you have an expensive mattress skip this product, and get one with a zipper that will truly protect your investment!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: it protecc
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Protects my mattress from damage, unlike how Amazon protects it's employees.
customer_reviews.author: ickolas

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress cover for our toddler. As many other reviewers state, the cover is NOT waterproof/toddler nighttime proof. Her mattress is soaked and it's as if we bought a general mattress cover and not one advertised as waterproof. If waterproof isn't an issue for you, it is soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sure Guard Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: The SureGuard fits the mattress well and it is easy to get on and off to launder. I bought it as a dust mite protector and the manufacturer did advise me that it will work for dust mites even though the mattress is not totally sealed. Dust mites for, at the top of the mattress from body heat, not at the bottom. Therefore, I am quite satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Waine

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it, but...it's too hot
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this awhile before writing the review. It washed well, fit the mattress nicely, and when tested for water repellence, did well. I poured several cups of water on it and none went through. My problem is that it is hot to sleep on. I have it under a standard mattress pad and a sheet. It makes the bed hotter than it was with my previous protector.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Easy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Before this we had a mattress protector that the mattress had to be put into! Ugh horrible. When finding this as a fitted sheet that made more sense! Easy to put on the bed and very soft. I was worried with the type of material it would not hold water but I was wrong! Several spills and accidents and my toddlers bed still looks brand new. I loved it so much I bought the same kind for our king mattress
customer_reviews.author: Haven Medders

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!! Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: This product fit on the bed perfectly.... however that's all that's perfect. My son wet the bed two times in a month and it went through to the matress!! It was Awful!! DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jager 209

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! FITTED SHEET STYLE!
customer_reviews.text: i didn't like this too much because i didn't read that it is a fitted sheet type. so really it is just a glorified sheet. it does not go around the whole mattress. but other than that, it wasn't noisy or sticky. it is a cloth material. can't speak on whether it is waterproof or not.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Does not completely encase mattress
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am rating 4 stars instead of 5, is for some reason I thought this crib mattress protector would cover the entire mattress, even below, with a zipper (completely encase the mattress inside). It fits fine, with mattress protector snugging the underside of each corner well. I just expected something different (pregnancy brain maybe? might have been my fault).
customer_reviews.author: Erica A

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to protect against nighttime accidents. The backing may feel like it'll protect the mattress, but this is simply not the case as she's had a couple of accidents and the mattress is clearly damp. It may help in that the mattress is not completely soaked as if there was no liner, but the mattress still ends up with some moisture from the accident. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lou

customer_reviews.title: No leaks I would strongly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 5 year old a new mattress and wanted to keep it new. Since he is 5 he hasn't had any accidents and I don't expect him to, but just to be safe... My biggest concern was is it waterproof? I read some of the reviews and started to worry. So I decided to test it out right out of the box. I laid the mattress protector on the counter and placed a newspaper underneath it. Than I took a full cup of water and poured it on. I check it right away... no leaks. I came back a hour later still the newspaper remained dry. No leaks I would strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 2 months and going strong!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really liking it, it's a great quality. I love how it fits like a fitted sheet. My old mattress protector didn't fit that way so it was very annoying having to wrap it around the mattress and it would never stay in place. This mattress protector stays in place and also has more room in case you have a mattress topper. It seems to be holding up pretty well with all the washes. It's been 2 months so I'll try to update if I notice anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress protector. I washed it before I put it on my child's bed. The top of the protector is fabric and has no plastic feeling at all. It must be some "magic" fabric. Within a few days of putting this on my daughter bed, she smuggled a juice cup into her bed and of course, spilt it. The mattress protector worked excellent and no juice went through onto the mattress. YEAH!! I slept on the bed and it was not hot, it felt like there was no mattress pad there at all.
customer_reviews.author: ABear Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work for a bed wetter!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product gets such high reviews. My kid had an accident and it did nothing to protect the mattress. It was a giant wet mess. I’ve only had the product for 2 months! I now have to order a brand new mattress as this is the second time I’ve had this issue. I wash and dry it regularly and agree that the “protection” must deteriorate pretty quickly despite using low heat settings. Not sufficient protection if you have a frequent bed wetter!
customer_reviews.author: K. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried the water resistance yet, and hopefully I'll never need to, but it's a good quality product. It's soft and fit perfect on my mattress. Its big enough to cover most of the underside so that it won't easily snap off like most fitted sheets do. In any case it will keep my mattress from getting dirty/stained, which is why I had to replace the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: IT IS NOT WATERPROOF AS CLAIMED - see my pic
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond disappointed in your claims that your mattress protector I purchased is 100% waterproof. IT IS NOT. Pic attached. My mattress is ruined because of your company’s claims that your products are waterproof! I CANNOT wash the cover on this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: If you have small children who seem to spill everything... THIS IS FOR YOU!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a durable cover for our new King since from time to time our littles sneaks in. Our old mattress our youngest would wake up soaked with sweat so after the first incident I was done. Came straight to amazon and bought this one for our new King, and never looked back! Bought covers for their beds as well in case of all juice Spilling etc. you can’t go wrong with this. It’s a MUST HAVE if you want to make your mattress last!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Taylor-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Designed for light accidents, not big ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this principally for my husband, who, although he has a SPC, still leaks a little, and sometimes more than a little. Generally it works well, but one night he managed to pull the catheter from the urine tubing. The bed was drenched, and the mattress protector wasn't able to deal with the amount. So be forewarned, if you're expecting something that can handle heavy flows.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked for us.
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new mattress. $$$$$ Split-King, so I bought two Twin XLs to protect it. Put it on just in time: cat had a disgusting runny-poo accident right in the middle of one the morning after we put it on. Don't know how long it sat there until discovered. But the mattress underneath was unharmed! Thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: HSHOBX

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, washer safe, we hang to dry. Works great for preventing elderly dogs accidents from harming mattress. Also great at preventing sweat from getting to mattress, which is a wonderful thing in a North Texas summer! Purchased the twin first, worked so well we got the full and another twin size already. Worth every penny in our opinions!
customer_reviews.author: Tee's

customer_reviews.title: which is probably a great feature for some
customer_reviews.text: It's truly waterproof, which is probably a great feature for some, but it's got like an actual plastic or vinyl layer. In my opinion, it makes for a sweaty night's sleep. Also hard to launder, because if you hang it dry it holds moisture for so long that it gets musty, but if you put it in the dryer your risk melting the non-fabric layer. I use it as a backup when our all-fabric protector is going through the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy two, so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for our son's full-sized mattress. It was easy to put on and kept the mattress dry when he had an accident. All I had to do was way and dry with the fitted sheet and we were good to go. Anyone with kids (whether you're dealing with accidents or allergies/asthma) should get this! I would actually recommend buying two of these, so if you have an accident in the middle of the night, you have a backup. So worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is second one and they come with a ten year warranty. They work great for a little over 10 years and then time to replace. Will replace in 10 years and not go over on this one! This cover is easy to take off and put on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with it because of the softness and the feel of not being too hot. I also like the idea that water beads on them and doesn't sink in making it easier to wipe up and clean. I don't like to be too hot when I sleep and this does not produce heat like plastic does. I just love it. Thanks for such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress protector for my new Tempurpedic mattress. The new mattress is only 9" depth. The mattress protector swallows this kingsize bed, hangs over the corners and will not fit snuggly. It bunches up under the fitted sheet and is very uncomfortable. I would not recommend this protector unless you have a 16" mattress as that is what it will stretch to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Get a size slightly bigger, they shrink in the wash
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these and tried one on our crib mattress in order to make sure they're the right size and I don't need to exchange them before putting them in the wash. Once I was satisfied with the fit I washed them with cold water and dried them on extra low (even lower than the instructions suggest). Now they barely go on the mattress. There's very little material that reaches all the way around on the sides. I definitely recommend getting something a little bit larger than your mattress size if you ever intend to wash the product.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: You won't notice it until you need it.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, hardly noticeable when installed, and lifesavers when you need them. We have this brand/model on several mattresses in the home, and each one has been "tested" with spills. They've done their job, and they're soft / comfortable enough that you don't know they're there until you need them.
customer_reviews.author: dfbarnes

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for me
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the mattress for a teenager with the sole purpose of protecting from period stains. It does this job well. Other than that I am not sure it is 100% water proof or if it would work for large spills or bed wetters. It is also pretty easy to clean as but does stain a little (not a big deal since it’s hidden under fitted sheets). I also like that it’s quiet and soft when rolling in bed, unlike other plastic mattress covers.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Destiny Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these when my Dad went into assisted living. They required this type of protector. Since then, I have ordered 3 more. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: This cover is useless. Definitely IS NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the purpose of protecting the mattress that my toddler grandsons would sleep in that sometimes have accidents at night. The 2 times this has happened the mattress was completely soaked. This cover is useless. Definitely IS NOT waterproof. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am really disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed with this product. I have a 7 year old nighttime bedwetter and all I can say is that this mattress protector is not waterproof! After multiple nights of pulling this mattress protector off the top bunk...only to find a damp, urine stained mattress underneath...I am just about ready to burn these!
customer_reviews.author: Devo13

customer_reviews.title: Good for foam/gel mattresses
customer_reviews.text: The mattress cover was just what I had searched for. I have a California King foam/gel mattress. The gel top layer has a cooling effect. Since this cover lets air pass through it the cooling effect is not impaired. It fit perfectly and was easy to put on. I have not washed it yet but the material appears as though it will stand up to frequent washing. I am 100% pleased with this SureGuard mattress protector.
customer_reviews.author: paul sellers

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing "premium" (as stated in description) whatsoever about this product. Unfortunately, the cotton is adhered to the waterproof fabric and thus it slides all over the place. Makes noise as you turn in bed! Elastic sides do not hold the pad down - which is due to the very cheap material. I wish I would have ordered from The Company Store or Garnet Hill. More money but you get quality. Very cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cote

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised how great it fit (which seems no longer for granted these days). We really like the material. Fortunately not tested for wetness yet, but I think it should be great. Normally I'm very sensitive to non-organic materials, but I'm VERY COMFORTABLE with this one and sleep very good.
customer_reviews.author: ComfortCats

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, easy to install, never had a spill to see how well it protects with one I purchased several years ago. Dropped one star as the older one is now starting to come apart in the wash, though it isn't enough to have to replace it yet. I wash it twice a year. So I have washed it @ 5-6 times. I would have liked to see it last longer. Still like it enough to by another one for our other bed.
customer_reviews.author: grayvard

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on multiple occasions!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased this mattress cover multiple times, on separate occasions. We have a dog who’s getting older and has accidents. This pad has protected not one but 2 of our beds! It’s not difficult to wash - however, due to it being water proof, it tends to hold more water than a non-waterproof pad after a wash cycle and takes longer to dry. Certainly not a deal breaker though. It’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Just needed to have an additional protection against any accidents that might happen - This is used with another mattress cover for another protective layer
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Had an accident and it worked great!
customer_reviews.text: How well does it fit on your bed? Fits my daybed great. Is it easy to put on? It was very easy to put on. Not loose but not so tight you have to strain to get it on. Any recent spills or stains it protected against? I have this in my dogs area of the house. A foster puppy had an accident on the bed and it was perfect. Mattress was completely dry. How simple is it to wash and dry? I took it off, washed and dried it, and it's back in place. I am happy with the quality so far! Would you recommend it? I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marks

customer_reviews.title: It's not waterproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 25 year old severely autistic daughter who has been potty trained since she was 5 years old started wetting the bed. The pandemic, loss of structure and not leaving the house for 6 months has made her regress to the point of bed wetting, aggression and depression. Even with an adult diaper on it still soaked the sheets and the supposedly waterproof mattress protector to the mattress which is now garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed, this is NOT waterproof, my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed, this is NOT waterproof, my son spilled a drink of water on my tempur-pedic mattress within the first 24hours that I'd put on this mattress protector, I didn't sweat it because I trusted the new cover, imagine my surprise & dissapointment when I pulled off the sheets & mattress protector only to discover a 6" wet spot on my mattresss! GRRRR
customer_reviews.author: KrisitaLoven

customer_reviews.title: (doesn't seem like a leak) Maybe it was washed at too high ...
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 1 year. The big round sweat stain on the mattress suggests the waterproofing is completely gone. (doesn't seem like a leak) Maybe it was washed at too high a temperature once too often or something? I don't feel this product deserves the near 5 star rating it has. I got rid of my stain with hydrogen peroxide + baking soda btw.
customer_reviews.author: Umopepisdn

customer_reviews.title: Good product, easy clean and effective
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. Easy to place on the bed. This even made my fitted sheet stay in place better. Fortunately for us (unfortunately for the review) we have not had any spills or accidents. Sadly we had to euthanize our 15yr old dog, which is why we bought this item originally. So unless we sit for some friends that have a dog w/ a weak bladder we probably won't be able to evaluate the resistance to liquids. Overall I would recommend this product simply to protect your mattress from excessive perspiration (hot nights no air conditioning) this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Getting wet
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it , as my baby sleeping half of the night with me , sometimes his diaper get leaks so the shit got wet and of this mattress cover also getting wet , not like I had previous one was still dry , the only one plus in this cover - doesn’t make a sounds so bad
customer_reviews.author: Asel

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to protect my mattress but this Suregraud did not work. The kitty's urine leaks through.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Follow the wash directions and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We've had two "spills" so far. We have a three year old who is still night training. It has not leaked through to the mattress. We followed the directions carefully. We wash it in warm water and we dry it partially hung and finish with low temp in the dryer. We did wash it before we used it as well. I do recommend buying two so you have a little time to wash and dry before you need it again.
customer_reviews.author: R.T.Frye

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is so much better than the ones I had in the past. They felt like plastic and it sounded like plastic every time you turned over. You don’t even know they are there. Haven’t spilled or had an accident, so I didn’t put anything for water resistant. So far I love it and know the beds are not going to get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fegert

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress protector to cover a new, inflateable queen bed used by a 3 and a 6 year old for a week at a beach house. The 3 year old is in the process of being potty trained. Protector was washed twice that week due to urinary seepage and fecal stains. When I took the pad off at the end of the week the inflatable bed was pristine. Washed and dried well. Fit the 18” queen mattress easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Mattress Protector
customer_reviews.text: Heavy-duty mattress pad that will likely last much longer than the typical product of it type. It fits my 15" deep king-size mattress perfectly. The corners grip firmly and it does not slip lose with use. The surface layer of material of protector appears to be quite resistant to liquid penetration. Over all I am very pleased with the SureGuard Mattress Protector in the early period it has been in use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... this Sure Guard Mattress Protector hoping it would work better than other protectors I've bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sure Guard Mattress Protector hoping it would work better than other protectors I've bought. YES it did all I hoped for. It was easy to put on and off my mattress, and fits my deep mattress perfectly. I've washed it twice with no problems and still fit like when I first got it. I am very please, and would buy it again . I recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Leontyne McKinney

customer_reviews.title: This one is great - there is not clammy feel or extreme heat ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to use on his new adjustable bed. He has challenges due to MS and a mattress protector is a necessity. This one is great - there is not clammy feel or extreme heat retention, which makes sleeping on it more comfortable. There has been no reason to launder it yet, but I'm confident it will do very well in the washer and dryer. Also, it fit his extra long mattress snugly without being hard to put on. Update - After two months use and many washings, this mattress protector is proving how good it is. It is soft, not clammy, and washes and dries without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Pyrma

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We had a cover that made us so hot and sweaty and we hated it. We got this one and it has been wonderful, We are never too hot. I like this protector a lot. I wanted to edit my review now. We still love it because we never get sweaty because of it but the other night I got sick and this mattress protector save my white brand new mattress. If I didn't have this mattress cover. I would have been so sad. The stain did not go through the protector at all, it was very easy to take off and clean and I am so happy I had this now.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed when I first received this mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when I first received this mattress protector. It is not thick at all, which I was expecting it to be. However, it does fit very nicely, it's not hot from the plastic lining, it isn't noisy when you move around on it due to the plastic backing. So although I was expecting one much thicker, I have to say this one seems to serve the purpose of protecting my mattress while fitting appropriately and being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AZgrammy

customer_reviews.title: This mattress protector changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior with incontinence problems. I tried so many other products before finding this one. It is truly WATERPROOF! Now I can sleep at night without worrying about accidents ruining my expensive mattress. It is soft and easy for an older, disabled person to put on the mattress. I just ordered two more. You will not be disappointed with this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Great for your mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sure guard protector. Nothing gets through to leave stains or anything on your mattress. Have had other covers that were way too big and did not fit properly and stayed wrinkled on top all the time. This cover fits the mattress very well. Will be ordering a second one to put back on while the other is being washed. It's light, not hot and you don't really know it's under there. I have dogs and cats that get on my bed and my Tempurpedic is still spotless and looks like I just bought it yesterday. Very much worth the price as I paid over $100 for others.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Croker

customer_reviews.title: Expecting a great performance
customer_reviews.text: While I cannot speak fort hew water resistance of ease of cleaning because I have not had to do either one of those tasks yet (after putting it onto the bed) I can say that the surface is definitely soft and helps to hold the sheet in place. It fits the queen bed like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: vabege

customer_reviews.title: A delight!
customer_reviews.text: Never any chemical smell that we could detect...I'm 67 years old, female, brought it in and placed it on my bed myself. Have gone through 2 traditional beds in the last couple of years, only to give them away after sagging and resultant back aches. This mattress is wonderful...no problems at all. The only frustration I've had is that my sheets, for large, high mattresses, are far to small. I highly recommend this mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: LLC

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This really works. Thank goodness the mattress is still like new after many accidents. I rinsethe spot thoroughly in the wash tub and then toss in the washing machine. Takes awhile to dry, but has held up very well after 2 years of use. There is plenty of room for extra thick mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: RQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: • It fits our deep, King Size Temperpedic mattress perfectly • It is very easy to put on. • It is not hot to sleep on. • It is not noisy AT ALL. • It protected our mattress from a hot coffee spill, and washed beautifully. No stained mattress; no stained SureGuard Mattress Protector! • I highly recommend this product, and it is reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, protects your mattress, might annoy sensative sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a 'just in case' since our cat was pregnant. It arrived and the day after I put it on the bet she had her kittens on the bed, saved my mattress! I washed is once before using. No liquid or smells got through that thing, washed it after and everything came out too. It feels a little weird though, I can tell it's on the bed. Not enough to ruin my sleep but if you're picky you might have problems.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Love the material
customer_reviews.text: Received this mattress cover and immediately put it on my California king size bed. I love the feel of the material it is made of and the ease to put it on my mattress. Read where some people complained it did not stop liquid from getting on their mattress. My female Maltese peed on it while I was out of town and it kept the urine from getting on the mattress. Washing and drying the cover was a breeze. I would highly recommend this mattress cover to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover fits well and works well. I had perched this mattress cover (my first) about one and a half years ago. I have been very pleased with that one so this in my second purchase of this mattress cover. It works very well and is easy (as any can be) to put on and take off to through in the washer. It also works well with spills.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Thelen

customer_reviews.title: A good fit
customer_reviews.text: My dog showed his peak with me by pulling back the covers and wetting the bed!! I needed a back up and this fit the bill perfectly. Needless to say the dog is now banned from the bed. This will provide perfect protection while the first cover is in use.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen G. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks... Our 3 year old sleeps with ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaks... Our 3 year old sleeps with us and will have an accident here and there. Bought this product thinking it would protect the mattress. It failed. It not only failed but the liquid had to penetrate through 3 other layers before going through this product that should have stopped liquid from penetrating through. Not "Sure" what this is sure of guarding us from. Perhaps monsters under the bed?
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: the mattress protector fit both my full size beds which have a mattresses and a topper on them. While you can hear a noise when putting it on, there is no noise once the sheets are on over it. Very comfortable and soft. They both were put to the test with nighttime accidents and passed. It was totally dry underneath. I made sure to take off the pad as soon as I was aware of the accident. I also read the reviews that said to wash in cold water, no bleach, on delicate and dry on the lowest setting. This has worked great and has been put to the test several times since. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice to know it is there...
customer_reviews.text: Spills can happen from coffee to pet accidents and it is nice to know this product is protecting the mattress. It fits beautifully, even over a topper mattress, it does not make funny noises, it is not hot, just super that it is there. The shipping etc. was on time and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: This company is amazing. I purchased the mattress protectors and thought I ...
customer_reviews.text: This company is amazing. I purchased the mattress protectors and thought I was getting encasement protectors. Instead I got protectors that go on like a fitted sheet. I shared my disappointment and was immediately contacted with a link to the protectors I actually wanted and an okay to send the others back for a refund. This kind of customer service gives me full confidence in the product. I've only had the product for a week but so far it's doing the job well. Kudos to the kind of customer service I admire and respect. I challenge other companies to follow suit!
customer_reviews.author: GigiMama

customer_reviews.title: Finally a mattress protector that doesn't retain heat!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to purchase this product, but after he dog peed on the bed I knew I needed to purchase some sort of mattress protector. I have purchased protectors in the past and returned them because I got overheated during the night. I run pretty warm, and pretty much anything will make me too warm during the night. I am pleased to say that this has been on our bed for over a week and I have slept well. I haven't spilled anything so I can't attest to how affective it was, but this will be much better than nothing like we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Hillmc719

product_meta.title: SureGuard Queen Size Mattress Protector - 100% Waterproof, Hypoallergenic - Premium Fitted Cotton Terry Cover
feature_bullets: 100% Waterproof - Top protection against perspiration, bed wetting, liquids and stains; 10-year quality guarantee (NOTE: For six-sided protection, buy a SureGuard Mattress Encasement).
Hypoallergenic - Blocks dust mites, allergens, bacteria, mildew and mold - For ultimate allergy relief, buy together with SureGuard Pillow Protectors.
Soft & Noiseless - 100% cotton terry surface; Wicks away moisture; Retains the feel of your mattress - Free from Vinyl, PVC, Phthalates, fire retardants and other toxic chemicals
Durable & Easy to Clean - Machine wash & dry - For frequent accidents, buy 2 or more - while one is washed, the other protects the mattress
Queen (60 in x 80 in) - Fitted Sheet Style; Stretchable skirt fits any depth mattress. Independently lab tested and GREENGUARD Gold certified.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars7,089 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: SureGuard warrants to the owner of each its products that if the laminate or fabric becomes damaged within a period of 10 years from the date of purchase as a result of normal household use, SureGuard will replace the protector provided the care instructions have been followed. The warranty covers the protector product only. Purchase receipt must be retained and presented to validate the warranty. For commercial purchases
